posts.author: butterflypinkdye
posts.content:
I've been glancing over some various servers that I'm interested in joining and most of them happen to max out levels at mid-epic character levels. I wanted to get a few ideas for fun, interesting, and most importantly, effective character builds that don't include trying to cheese my way through explaining another Bard/Fighter/RDD.

If these aren't archived, anyone have an idea to toss my way?

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
Others may have more accurate information but I am pretty certain all the pre-epic builds from the legacy ECB are lost forever because they were never ported to WoG (unless The_Krit is stashing them in his back pocket somewhere). Actually, all those builds were really just adjuncts of pre-epic & mid-epic requests tacked onto the ECB main guild. I do know that there was never any search engine for those genres so was just a huge list that had to be visually scrolled to find what you were interested in (and hopefully, the title was descriptive enough to make it an time-economical venture).

What IS of interest to me though is whether these new non-lvl 40 ECB builds will be able to be perused with The_Krit's ECB search engine. At least that will give full access to locating such builds from this point forward. Not that TK needs anything else laid on his plate, though.

This place seems a good place to start compiling them so why not get the ball rolling and post the requests of those which interest you?

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
To the best of my knowledge the Pre Epic Character Builder Guild (the guild were lvl 20 and lvl 30 builds were being published) was never archived at all. I am planning to repost here my handful of lvl 20/30 builds and I do invite anyone to post their own builds in order to make these boards richer for the benefit of all.

The Pre Epic Character Builder Guild was not a huge archive by a long shot, I guess we can easily enough "rebuild" its content here with a little effort. And we can also hope for the Legacy fora and guilds to be back, eventually.

posts.author: grom
posts.content: This may be a silly question.... But wouldn't "Pre-Epic" builds be 1st through 20th? I thought Epic came at 20th or 21st level.

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content: And I have to correct myself. The Pre-epic Character Builds guild has been archived by the almighty The_Krit here at the vault. Download and enjoy. Link added in the Tools of the builder thread.

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content:
grom wrote:This may be a silly question.... But wouldn't "Pre-Epic" builds be 1st through 20th? I thought Epic came at 20th or 21st level.
Aye, but since the ECB guild handled only lvl 40 builds the Pre-epic Character Builds Guild incorporated the lvl 21-30 ones too, despite the guild's name. One of the reasons a different guild was needed was the limit of available forum boards a guild could have at the BW legacy forums.

posts.author: grom
posts.content: Ah.. I see, thanks for the info Kail... Here... have a mug of the good stuff... On GDL's tab, of course!

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
KailPendragon wrote:And I have to correct myself. The Pre-epic Character Builds guild has been archived by the almighty The_Krit here at the vault. Download and enjoy. Link added in the Tools of the builder thread.
That TK is a maniac! I even found my one-and-only build right there where it is supposed to be. TK should light some flares when he does this stuff. It would have saved me an hour digging through my papers looking for it when the legacy boards went *poof*. Gotta luv it! Thanks for the alert, Kail!
